document_data.name: Alfalfa
document_data.mainbody: '''Alfalfa''', also known as '''lucerne''', It had a distinctive sweet smell.
document_data.Availability:
Places in the Realms where alfalfa was known to be cultivated included:
* In [[Cormyr]], alfalfa was one of the grains that filled fields across the nation that spanned hundreds of acres. Including [[Kirinwood]].<ref>
* In the [[Moonshae Isles]], alfalfa was grown on the island of [[Snowdown]].
* Alfalfa could be found in [[the Vast]], where businesses such as [[Norge Greenbank's Horses]] fed them to horses.{{Cite polyhedron/103/The Living City: The Horse Businesses|13-14}}
* In the [[Blade Kingdoms]], lucerne was collected and kept as cattle and horse feed.
document_data.Usages:
* [[Centaurs]] were known to sometimes eat either fresh or dried alfalfa.<ref>{{Cite dragon/103/The Centaur Papers|37}}
* Some used alfalfa in the crafting of alchemical powders for curing nausea or paralysis.<ref>{{Cite dragon/130/Better Living Through Alchemy|39}}
